description.description:
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Throw a bolt of frost at an enemy, dealing {#values1} damage and Chilling them for 15%.

— Enchantment Effect —
Direct damage from Skills applies up to {#values2} Chill.
Frost Bolt has a 15% chance to explode on Chilled enemies, hitting surrounding enemies. Chance increased to 100% against Frozen enemies.
Frost Bolt makes Frozen enemies Vulnerable for 3 seconds.
Frost Bolt generates 4 Mana when hitting Chilled or Frozen enemies.

Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Launch a bolt of lightning that shocks an enemy 4 times, dealing {#values1} damage each hit.

— Enchantment Effect —
Killing an enemy has a {#values2} chance to form a Crackling Energy.

Each time Spark hits its primary target, it has a 20% chance to hit up to 3 additional enemies, dealing {#values1} damage. If there are no other enemies to hit, Spark instead deals x20% increased damage to its primary target.
Each time Spark hits an enemy it has a 3% chance to form a Crackling Energy.
Spark grants +2% increased Critical Strike Chance per cast for 3 seconds, up to +10%.

Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Unleash arcing lightning that deals {#values1} damage to enemies in front of you. Every 10 times Arc Lash swipes, it Stuns all enemies hit for 2 seconds.

— Enchantment Effect —
When you use a Cooldown, enemies around you are Stunned for {0.5/0.55/0.6/0.65/0.7/0.75/0.8/0.85/0.9/0.95} seconds.
If Arc Lash's initial swipe Critically Strikes, it swipes an additional time.
Hitting a Stunned enemy with Arc Lash reduces your Cooldowns by 0.25 seconds.
Gain +6% Movement Speed for 5 seconds per enemy hit with Arc Lash, up to +18%.

Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Hurl a flaming bolt, dealing {#values1} damage and Burning for {#values2} damage over 8 seconds.

— Enchantment Effect —
Direct damage from Skills applies up to an additional {#values3} Burning damage over 8 seconds.
Fire Bolt pierces through Burning enemies.
Critical Strikes with Fire Bolt increase the Burning damage you deal to the enemy by x20% for 4 seconds.
Fire Bolt generates 2 Mana when hitting a Burning enemy.

Mana Cost: {#}
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Release 5 bolts of lightning that course along the ground in an erratic pattern, dealing {#values1} damage each.

— Enchantment Effect —
When you Stun an enemy, there's a 40% chance to release 3 Charged Bolts from them.
Hitting an enemy at least 3 times with same cast of Charged Bolts releases a lightning nova, dealing 15% damage to enemies around them.
Charged Bolts deals x25% increased damage to Stunned enemies.
Hitting an enemy with Charged Bolts reduces their damage dealt by 20% for 3 seconds.

Mana Cost: {#}
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Unleash an orb that Chills for 34% and expels piercing shards, dealing a total of {#values1} damage. Upon expiration, Frozen Orb explodes, dealing {#values2} damage and Chilling enemies for 8.7%.

— Enchantment Effect —
Whenever you cast a Non-Basic Skill, you have a 20% chance to launch a Frozen Orb at a Nearby enemy.
When cast above 50 Mana, Frozen Orb's explosion damage is increased by x30%.
Frozen Orb's explosion restores 5 Mana when hitting a Frozen enemy.
Frozen Orb's explosion has a 25% chance to make all enemies hit Vulnerable for 2 seconds. Frozen Orb always makes Frozen enemies Vulnerable.

Mana Cost: {#} per second
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Channel a beam of fire, Burning enemies for {#values1} damage per second. Damage per second increases over 4 seconds, up to {#values2}.

— Enchantment Effect —
Every 20 seconds, a serpent spawns and Incinerates enemies for 6 seconds.
While channeling Incinerate, you Burn enemies around you for 15% of the damage per second.
Enemies deal 20% less damage while Burning from Incinerate.
Every 4 seconds an enemy has been hit by Incinerate, they are Immobilized for 1 seconds.

Mana Cost: {#}
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Hurl an exploding ball of fire, dealing {#values1} damage to surrounding enemies.

— Enchantment Effect —
When you kill an enemy, they explode in a Fireball for 50% of its damage.
Fireball's radius is increased based on distance traveled, up to 50%.
Fireball deals 10% of the Burning damage you've applied to enemies as additional direct damage.
Fireball's explosion's Critical Strike Damage is increased by +10%. Each enemy it hits increases this bonus by +5%, up to +25% total.

Mana Cost: {#}
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Unleash a stream of lightning that deals {#values1} damage and chains between Nearby enemies and you up to 6 times, prioritizing enemies.

— Enchantment Effect —
Chain Lightning forms automatically after spending 100 Mana.
Chain Lightning gains a +3% increased Critical Strike Chance per bounce.
If Chain Lightning bounces off of you, its next hit deals x25% increased damage.
When Chain Lightning Critically Strikes, it has a 25% chance to form a Crackling Energy.

Mana Cost: {#}
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Launch 5 shards that deal {#values1} damage each. Deals x25% increased damage to Frozen enemies.

— Enchantment Effect —
Ice Shards automatically conjure and fly towards Frozen enemies.
Ice Shards have a 15% chance to ricochet to another enemy. Ice Shards always ricochet off of Frozen enemies.
While you have a Barrier active, casts of Ice Shards treat enemies as if they were Frozen.
Hitting an enemy with 5 Ice Shards in a single cast makes them Vulnerable for 2 seconds.
Your Maximum Mana is increased by {3/6/9/12/15/18/21/24/27/30}.
Your Core Skills deal x{#values1} increased damage when cast above 50 Mana.
After casting a Non-Basic Skill, you gain {#values1} Resistance to all elements and {#values2} additional Resistance to that Skill's element for 3 seconds.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Engulf yourself in flames for {2/2.2/2.4/2.6/2.8/3/3.2/3.4/3.6/3.8} seconds, Burning surrounding enemies for {#values1} damage per second.
While Flame Shield is active, you are Immune.

— Enchantment Effect —
Flame Shield automatically activates when you take fatal damage. Can only happen once every 120 seconds.
Flame Shield grants +25% Movement Speed while active.
You gain 25% Mana Cost Reduction while Flame Shield is active.
Flame Shield Heals you for 50% of your missing Life.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Unleash a torrent of frost, Freezing enemies around you for 2 seconds.

— Enchantment Effect —
Lucky Hit: Your Conjuration Skills have a 30% chance to unleash a Frost Nova when hitting enemies.
Killing enemies Frozen by Frost Nova reduces its Cooldown by 2 seconds, up to 6 seconds per cast.
Frost Nova makes enemies Vulnerable for 4 seconds, increased to 8 seconds against Bosses.
Frost Nova generates 4 Mana per enemy hit.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
A Barrier of ice forms around you for 6 seconds, absorbing {#}% of your Base Life in damage. While Ice Armor is active, 10% of your damage dealt is added to its Barrier.

— Enchantment Effect —
Upon getting hit, you have a 5% chance to apply Ice Armor.
While Ice Armor is active, your Mana Regeneration is increased by x25%.
Enemies that hit you while Ice Armor is active have a 15% chance to become Frozen for 3 seconds.
Damage against Vulnerable enemies contributes 100% more to Ice Armor's Barrier.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Transform into lightning, becoming Unstoppable and surging to the target location, dealing {#values1} damage around you upon arrival.

— Enchantment Effect —
Evade is replaced with a short range Teleport on a {17/17/16.15/15.3/14.45/13.6/12.92/12.24/11.56/10.88} second Cooldown.
Teleport's Cooldown is decreased by 0.5 seconds per enemy hit, up to 3 seconds.
For 4 seconds after Teleporting, Crackling Energy hits 2 additional enemies.
After Teleporting, you gain 30% Damage Reduction for 5 seconds.
Lucky Hit: Critical Strikes have a {#values1} chance to reset the Cooldown of one of your Defensive Skills. Can only happen once every 10 seconds.
You deal x{#values1} increased damage, but take x{#values2} more damage.

Mana Cost: {#}
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Summon a 3-headed hydra for 12 seconds. Each head spits fire at enemies, dealing {#values1} damage.
Maximum 1 active Hydras at a time.

— Enchantment Effect —
After spending 300 Mana, a 5-headed Hydra spawns for 5 seconds.
While Healthy, your casts of Hydra gain 1 additional head.
After you Critically Strike, your Hydras gain +30% Critical Strike Chance for 3 seconds.
Hydra also Burns enemies for an additional 12% of its Base damage dealt over 6 seconds.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Conjure a pair of ice blades for 6 seconds that rapidly slash enemies for {#values1} damage and have a 30% chance to make them Vulnerable for 2 seconds.

— Enchantment Effect —
For every 20 seconds in Cooldowns you spend, you spawn an Ice Blades on a random enemy.
Ice Blades's Cooldown is reduced by 1 second each time it hits a Vulnerable enemy.
50% of Enhanced Ice Blades's Cooldown reduction is applied to your other Skills.
Your Ice Blades gain +10% increased Attack Speed per active Ice Blades.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Conjure a spear of lightning that seeks out enemies for 6 seconds, dealing {#values1} damage per hit.

— Enchantment Effect —
Absorbing Crackling Energy has a 10% chance to conjure a Lightning Spear.
After Critically Striking, Lightning Spear gains a +5% increased stacking Critical Strike Chance for its duration.
Collecting Crackling Energy increases the damage of your next Lightning Spear cast by x20%, up to x100%.
Lightning Spear Stuns enemies for 2 seconds when Critically Striking.
You deal x{#values1} increased damage for each active Conjuration.
Your Lucky Hit Chance is increased by +{#values1}.
You gain {#values1} Damage Reduction against Elites for each second you haven't taken damage from one, up to 50%.
Every time you spend 100 Mana, you gain {#values1} Damage Reduction for 5 seconds.
Using a Cooldown grants {#values1} of your Maximum Life as a Barrier for 5 seconds.

Mana Cost: {#}
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Summon a meteor that strikes the target location, dealing {#values1} damage and Burning the ground for {#values2} damage over 3 seconds.

— Enchantment Effect —
Lucky Hit: 3% chance for a Meteor to fall on enemies.
If a cast of Meteor hits 3 or more enemies, there is a 30% chance an additional Meteor falls on the same location.
Meteor falls 30% faster.
Meteor's impact Immobilizes enemies for 2 seconds.

Mana Cost: {#}
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Summon a frigid blizzard that deals {#}% damage and continually Chills enemies for 18% over 8 seconds.

— Enchantment Effect —
Every 15 seconds, a Blizzard forms over you and follows you for 6 seconds.
Blizzard deals x25% increased damage to Frozen enemies.
When cast above 50 Mana, Blizzard's duration is increased by 4 seconds.
While you have an active Blizzard, your Core Skills cost 10% less Mana.

Mana Cost: {#}
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Discharge a ball of lightning that slowly moves forward, continually zapping enemies for {#}% damage.

— Enchantment Effect —
Lucky Hit: Critical Strikes have a 25% chance to spawn a static Ball Lightning.
Ball Lightning's damage rate is increased by 200% of your Attack Speed Bonus.
If an enemy is hit at least 4 times by a cast of Ball Lightning, a Crackling Energy is formed. Can only happen once per cast.
After hitting Close enemies 50 times with Ball Lightning, your next cast of it Stuns enemies hit for 1 seconds.
Your Pyromancy Skills deal x{#values1} increased damage while you are Healthy.
Lucky Hit: Your Pyromancy Skills have a {#values1} chance to Immobilize enemies for 2 seconds. This chance is doubled while you are Healthy.
You deal x{#values1} increased Critical Strike Damage against Burning enemies. If they are also Immobilized, this bonus is increased to x{#values2}.
Lucky Hit: Critical Strikes with Shock Skills have up to a {#values1} chance to form a Crackling Energy.
Upon absorbing Crackling Energy, you gain {4/8/12/16/20/24/28/32/36/40} Mana.
Every time you Stun an enemy, you deal {#values1} Lightning damage to them.
Your Barriers have a +{#values1} increased duration.
Lucky Hit: Frost Skills have a {#values1} chance to instantly Freeze.
While you have a Barrier active, you apply x{#values1} more Chill.

Mana Cost: {#}
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Create a wall of flames that Burns enemies for {#values1} damage over 8 seconds.

— Enchantment Effect —
Each time an enemy takes Burning damage, there's a 5% chance to spawn 2 Firewalls underneath them for 3 seconds.
Enemies take x25% increased Burning damage from you while standing in Firewall.
You gain x5% increased Mana Regeneration per active Firewall, up to x25%.
Enemies continue Burning for 3 seconds after leaving Firewall.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Summon a fiery serpent that continually constricts the target area, Burning enemies for 295% damage over 8 seconds.
Inferno repeatedly Pulls enemies to its center.
While Inferno is active, your Pyromancy Skills cost no Mana.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lightning surges within you for 10 seconds. Whenever you cast a Shock Skill, a random Core, Conjuration, or Mastery Shock Skill is also cast.
Unstable Currents increases your Attack Speed by +25% while active.
While Unstable Currents is active, Crackling Energy continually pulses and consumes no charges.

Cooldown: {#} seconds
Lucky Hit Chance: {#}%
Encase yourself in ice, becoming Immune for 4 seconds, continually dealing 12.5% damage, and Chilling enemies for 20%. When Deep Freeze expires, it deals an additional 100% damage.
Casting Deep Freeze again ends the effect early.
When Deep Freeze ends, gain 10% of your Base Life as a Barrier for 6 seconds for each enemy you Froze while it was active.
When Deep Freeze ends, your Non-Ultimate Cooldowns are reduced by 50%.
Frost Skills deal x{#values1} increased damage to Elites.
You deal x{#values1} increased damage to Chilled enemies, and x{#values2} increased damage to Frozen enemies.
Lucky Hit: Cold Damage against Vulnerable enemies has a 20% chance to generate {5/10/15/20/25/30/35/40/45/50} Mana.
You deal x{#values1} increased Cold Damage to Vulnerable enemies.
Hitting enemies with Shock Skills increases your Critical Strike Chance by +{#values1}. Resets upon getting a Critical Strike.
Enemies deal {#values1} less damage for 5 seconds after being Critically Struck by your Shock Skills.
Lucky Hit: Shock Skills have a {#values1} chance to Stun enemies for 3 seconds.
Critical Strikes with Shock Skills increase your Movement Speed by +{#values1} for 3 seconds.
Killing a Burning enemy increases your Mana Regeneration by +{#values1} for 3 seconds.
You deal increased Burning damage to enemies for each second they remain Burning, up to x{#values1} after 5 seconds.
Every 1 second, you Heal for {#values1} of your Maximum Life for each Nearby Burning enemy. Healing increased to {#values2} from Bosses.
After standing still for 1.5 seconds, your Pyromancy Skills cost {#values1} less Mana.
After Freeze expires, enemies explode for 25% of the damage you dealt to them while Frozen.

Lucky Hit: Your Frost Skills have up to a 10% chance to make your next cast of Ice Shards, Frozen Orb, or Blizzard consume no Mana and deal x40% increased damage. Chance is doubled against Vulnerable enemies.
Your Burning effects deal x{#values1} increased damage per unique source of Burning you have applied to the enemy. If the enemy is Burning from 3 or more sources, this bonus is doubled.

Your Fire Critical Strike Damage is increased by x25% against enemies above 50% Life. Your Fire Critical Strike Chance is increased by +5% against enemies below 50% Life.
Killing an enemy with a Critical Strike grants both bonuses against all enemies for 3 seconds.
Crackling Energy hits 1 additional enemy. Each time Crackling Energy hits an enemy, your Shock Skill Cooldowns are reduced by 0.1 seconds, increased to 0.25 seconds against Elites.
Close enemies take x10% increased damage from your Shock Skills and deal 20% less damage to you. Critical Strikes increase these bonuses by 25% for 3 seconds.
